txt.en: Collected a mug of Thistlebelly Brew

You have received an order to fill a delivery to a member of the Inn League who has been stranded away from the festival this season.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'I have here a list of requests to assist Inn League members in need, stranded away from home without the support of their beer-loving brethren. It seems they miss their favourite drinks, or in some cases they've never even tasted them!

'My good friend Wald Mugwort is famous for pickling himself and then getting himself into a pickle. I believe he whisked himself off to the Lone-lands on an ill-advised drunken misadventure. I don't think he will be brave enough to return unless you get some Thistlebelly Brew in his belly.

'Thistlebelly Brew comes from The Ivy Bush. You should pick some up and bring this to Wald, who managed to find himself in some uncouth place called Ost Haer.'
Thistlebelly Brew can be purchased from The Ivy Bush in Hobbiton.\n\nYou should get some Thistlebelly Brew to deliver to Wald Mugwort.

'Oh dear, oh dear, I seem to have gotten myself into a pickle! Quite a pickle, indeed! I was such a fool thinking I could do this on my own, and now I am here all on my lonesome. Ah, but here you are, perhaps you can help!

'Oh goodness, I seem to have rattled on a bit there. I've had such a scare, so my wits are in tatters. You see, I am a hobbit from Hobbiton and a member of the Inn League. I was seeking to complete the League's Challenge and thought it would be a grand adventure, like old Mad Baggins'! But it would seem all I've done is get myself surrounded by all manner of evil creatures. However, if I had a bit of a taste of home, I could regain my courage and make it safely away from here!

'Could you bring me a bit of \qThistlebelly's Brew\q from the Ivy Bush in Hobbiton? That should be all I need to set myself straight!'

The Ivy Bush is in the village of Hobbiton in the Shire, far to the west of the Lone-lands. Wald Mugwort is at Ost Haer in the Lone-lands, far to the east of the Shire.\n\nWald Mugwort, a Hobbit from Hobbiton, feels he needs a bit of a taste of home if he is to continue on his quest to complete the Inn League's Challenge. He has asked you to bring him a bit of \qThistlebelly's Brew\q from the Ivy Bush in Hobbiton.
'You'll want to start at The Ivy Bush, I imagine. It is a famous inn, in Hobbiton.'

'Ah, a bit of \qThistlebelly's Brew,\q isn't it? Oh wonderful! Already, I can feel my lagging spirits picking up!\n\n'With that beer in my belly, there will be no creature, great or small, that will put the fear into me. I will complete the League's Challenge yet!'
'Please go to The Ivy Bush, and hurry! I need that beer....'

'Oh dear, you don't have the \qThistlebelly's Brew\q yet? Oh, if I'm ever to calm my nerves and get myself away from this awful place, I'll need a bit of a taste from home. Please bring me a bit of the brew from The Ivy Bush.'
Collect Thistlebelly Brew from the Ivy Bush in Hobbiton
Bring Thistlebelly Brew to Wald Mugwort
Collect a mug of Thistlebelly Brew
Return with Thistlebelly Brew before time expires!
